item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0269; 04:55AM; 1022 W 84th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E7wAbl; #VermontKnolls; 29 Firefighters took just 24 minutes in well-coordinated defensive operations, to extinguish (5:19 AM) fire in a vacant 1 story home, the site of a previous blaze. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E266 E33 E46 E57 RA257 T33 T64 T66; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #LaurelCanyonFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/07/2022 INC#1874

item.description: Knockdown - #LaurelCanyonFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1874; 11:21PM; 6150 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r20MPF; #NorthHollywood; 79 LAFD Firefighters took just 43 minutes in well-coordinated defensive operations to confine heavy fire within a 50' x 100' vacant and boarded one-story commercial building among a row of mostly vacant buildings. No injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation. Media: LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is on scene.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E60 E76 E77 E81 E89 EA1 EM11 EM14 HE1 RA102 RA60 RA889 RA89 RS3 T27 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #LaurelCanyonFire - 01/07/2022 INC#1874

item.description: Update #LaurelCanyonFire - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1874; 11:06PM; 6150 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r20MPF; #NorthHollywood; Defensive firefighting operations continue, as firefighters seek to confine the fire to the well involved 50' x 100' (apparently vacant and) boarded one-story building among a row of mostly vacant buildings. No injuries reported. Media: LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is en route, ETA 11:30 PM. #LATraffic: One or more lanes of Laurel Canyon Boulevard in the immediate area of the fire are expected to be closed until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E60 E76 E77 E81 E89 EM11 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T27 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

item.description: Update #LaurelCanyonFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1874; 10:50PM; 6150 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r20MPF; #NorthHollywood; With 75 LAFD Firefighters assigned and fire now through the roof, this firefight has transitioned to defensive operations and attained a Greater Alarm status; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E278 E289 E298 E60 E76 E77 E89 EM11 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T27 T60 T78 T89 T98 UR27; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 01/07/2022 INC#1782

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1782; 10:00PM; 612 W 26th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q27jKN; #SanPedro; Sedan collided with an occupied residence, trapping *one* person (unknown age / gender) in the vehicle only, who has been determined dead at the scene. Though the vehicle and one involved unit in a row of bungalow-style homes were significantly damaged, there are no other injuries. Department of Building and Safety en route (ETA 11:00 PM) to determine if structure can be reoccupied. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #3522); FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC4 BC6 E101 E248 E285 E36 E85 EM13 HR3 RA112 RA79 RA848 RA85 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1782; 09:35PM; 612 W 26th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q27jKN; #SanPedro; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into house with two persons trapped in vehicle. ; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E101 E248 EM13 RA112 RA848 T48; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0944; 01:18PM; 440 S Bonnie Brae St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q3Gvd6; #Westlake; Thanks to the presence of functional fire sprinklers, the first arriving 20 LAFD Firefighters took just 11 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames in one 2nd (top) floor unit, of a 29-unit 19,346 square-foot two-story H-shaped center hallway apartment building (built 1923). No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 E220 RA13 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1240; 04:25PM; 1211 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3eV5Qjc; #EchoPark; The first arriving 30 Firefighters took just 11 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames in an offensive firefight within a vacant one story commercial building, where a rubbish fire had extended within the structure.
